<template>
  <nav>
    <router-link :to="{name: 'Home'}">Home</router-link> |
    <router-link :to="{name: 'AllData'}">All Data</router-link> |
    <router-link :to="{name: 'Recordings'}">Recordings</router-link>
  </nav>
  <router-view/>
</template>

<script>
import getMqttClient from "@/composables/getMqttClient";
//import {ref} from "vue";
import mqtt from "precompiled-mqtt";
import {ref} from "vue";

export default {
  setup(){
    const mqtt = require('precompiled-mqtt')

    const options = {
      // Clean session
      clean: true,
      connectTimeout: 4000,
      // Auth
      //clientId: 'emqx_test',
      //username: 'emqx_test',
      //password: 'emqx_test',
    }

    //const client  = mqtt.connect('mqtt://broker.emqx.io:1883', options)

    let client = ref(null)

    const connect = async () => {
      client  = ref( await mqtt.connect('mqtt://127.0.0.1:9001'))

      client.value.on('connect', function () {
        console.log('Connected')
        client.value.subscribe('test', function (err) {
          if (!err) {
            client.value.publish('test', 'Hello mqtt')
          }
        })
      });

      client.value.on('message', function (topic, message) {
        // message is Buffer
        console.log(message.toString())
      });
    }

  }
}
</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
}

nav {
  padding: 30px;
}

nav a {
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #2c3e50;
}

nav a.router-link-exact-active {
  color: #42b983;
}
</style>
